speaker: Sarah
text: The network issue was caused by an unexpected DNS propagation delay.
ipa: ðə ˈnɛtwɜrk ˈɪʃu wəz kɔzd baɪ ən ˌʌnɪkˈspɛktɪd ˌdiɛnˈɛs ˌprɑpəˈɡeɪʃən dɪˈleɪ

speaker: CTO
text: Was that something that could have been prevented?
ipa: wəz ðæt ˈsʌmθɪŋ ðæt kʊd həv bɪn prɪˈvɛntɪd

speaker: Sarah
text: Potentially. A warning had been issued by the infrastructure team two days before the rollout, but it wasn't escalated properly.
ipa: pəˈtɛnʃəli. ə ˈwɔrnɪŋ həd bɪn ˈɪʃud baɪ ði ˈɪnfrəˌstrʌkʧər tim tu deɪz bɪˈfɔr ðə ˈroʊˌlaʊt, bət ɪt ˈwəzənt ˈɛskəˌleɪtɪd ˈprɑpərli
linking: "had been" → /həd bɪn/ (d + b linking), "wasn't escalated" → /ˈwəzənt ˈɛskəˌleɪtɪd/ (t + e linking)

speaker: CTO
text: So no contingency plan was activated?
ipa: soʊ noʊ kənˈtɪnʤənsi plæn wəz ˈæktəˌveɪtɪd

speaker: Sarah
text: Correct. A fallback route was designed, but unfortunately, it wasn’t enabled at the time of failure.
ipa: kəˈrɛkt. ə ˈfɔlˌbæk raʊt wəz dɪˈzaɪnd, bət ənˈfɔrʧənətli, ɪt ˈwəzənt ɛˈneɪbəld æt ðə taɪm əv ˈfeɪljər
linking: "route was" → /raʊt wəz/ (t + w linking), "wasn't enabled" → /ˈwəzənt ɛˈneɪbəld/ (t + e linking)

speaker: Sarah
text: Yes — they were notified as soon as packet loss was detected. Their engineers are being looped in for a joint RCA.
ipa: jɛs — ðeɪ wɜr ˈnoʊtəˌfaɪd əz sun əz ˈpækɪt lɔs wəz dɪˈtɛktɪd. ðɛr ˌɛnʤəˈnɪrz ɑr ˈbiɪŋ lupt ɪn fɔr ə ʤɔɪnt ˌɑr.siˈeɪ
linking: "packet loss" → /ˈpækɪt lɔs/ (t + l linking), "being looped" → /ˈbiɪŋ lupt/ (ŋ + l linking)

speaker: Sarah
text: The faulty entry was removed, and a temporary patch was applied. A full update is going to be deployed tonight.
ipa: ðə ˈfɔlti ˈɛntri wəz rɪˈmuvd, ənd ə ˈtɛmpəˌrɛri pæʧ wəz əˈplaɪd. ə fʊl ˈʌpˌdeɪt ɪz ˈɡoʊɪŋ tu bi dɪˈplɔɪd təˈnaɪt
linking: "patch was" → /pæʧ wəz/ (ʧ + w linking), "going to be" → /ˈɡoʊɪŋ tu bi/ (ŋ + t linking)

speaker: CTO
text: Make sure a new runbook is created, and have the team get it reviewed by both DevOps and SecOps.
ipa: meɪk ʃʊr ə nu ˈrʌnˌbʊk ɪz kriˈeɪtɪd, ənd hæv ðə tim ɡɛt ɪt rɪˈvjud baɪ boʊθ ˈdɛvˌɑps ənd ˈsɛkˌɑps

speaker: Sarah
text: Already on it. Also, a post-incident summary has been drafted and will be sent out to all stakeholders today.
ipa: ɔlˈrɛdi ɑn ɪt. ˈɔlsoʊ, ə poʊst-ˈɪnsɪdənt ˈsʌməri hæz bɪn ˈdræftɪd ənd wɪl bi sɛnt aʊt tu ɔl ˈsteɪkˌhoʊldərz təˈdeɪ
linking: "been drafted" → /bɪn ˈdræftɪd/ (n + d linking), "sent out" → /sɛnt aʊt/ (t + aʊ linking)
